channel.title: Strategy – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Hooked Inc Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Do you have the idea of being the best fisherman? In this addictive clicker game, you will embark on your sea fishing adventure. Earn more gold coins to upgrade your ship and equipment, and hire and train more of your crew. Make your journey fuller and peak.Use the mouse or your finger to play.
item.content:encoded:
Do you have the idea of being the best fisherman? In this addictive clicker game, you will embark on your sea fishing adventure. Earn more gold coins to upgrade your ship and equipment, and hire and train more of your crew. Make your journey fuller and peak.
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: For transfer: Beach Dessert Shop!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a game that simulates running a seaside dessert shop, where you must navigate high operating costs and fierce competition to survive. Being close to the seaside helps maintain a steady flow of customers, but it’s still subject to weather conditions. You need to employ marketing strategies to boost foot traffic. Additionally, you must […]
item.content:encoded:
This is a game that simulates running a seaside dessert shop, where you must navigate high operating costs and fierce competition to survive. Being close to the seaside helps maintain a steady flow of customers, but it’s still subject to weather conditions. You need to employ marketing strategies to boost foot traffic. Additionally, you must utilize convenient shopping methods to cater to consumers’ personalized and diverse shopping experiences. Simultaneously, you must pay attention to the quality of your products and comply with various inspections conducted by regulatory authorities, as failure to do so may lead to immediate bankruptcy.
*mouse*

item.title: Trump Wobble Walk Challenge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Trump Wobble Walk Challenge is a hilarious and entertaining online game suitable for both kids and adults! The objective is simple yet challenging: guide the Trump ragdoll as it wobbles its way to the finish line. Be careful not to fall, collect coins along the way, and enjoy endless fun in this quirky and engaging […]
item.content:encoded:
Trump Wobble Walk Challenge is a hilarious and entertaining online game suitable for both kids and adults! The objective is simple yet challenging: guide the Trump ragdoll as it wobbles its way to the finish line. Be careful not to fall, collect coins along the way, and enjoy endless fun in this quirky and engaging game.
*left*, *right* *mouse*

item.title: Trump Ragdoll
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Ragdoll Challenge is an online game that you can play for free. Ragdoll Challenge is a parody and should not be taken seriously, but you can have a try in your spare time. The players need to use the mouse or tap on the screen to play around. Hope you can join us and have […]
item.content:encoded:
Ragdoll Challenge is an online game that you can play for free. Ragdoll Challenge is a parody and should not be taken seriously, but you can have a try in your spare time. The players need to use the mouse or tap on the screen to play around. Hope you can join us and have fun!
*mouse**tap*

item.title: Christmas Tree Solitaire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A Pyramid Solitaire game for Christmas. Remove all cards from the christmas tree by combining 2 cards to a total value of 13.
item.content:encoded: A Pyramid Solitaire game for Christmas. Remove all cards from the christmas tree by combining 2 cards to a total value of 13.

item.title: 2048 Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 2048 Puzzle is a classic skill number game, simple and addictive. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Let’s make the best possible result in one of the three levels. Have fun!*arrows**mouse*
item.content:encoded:
2048 Puzzle is a classic skill number game, simple and addictive. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Let’s make the best possible result in one of the three levels. Have fun!
*arrows**mouse*

item.title: Archery Bastions: Castle War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.On PC and MobileTap and hold = […]
item.content:encoded:
Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.
On PC and MobileTap and hold = aimRelease the finger = fire

item.title: Plants Vs Zombies War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Easy to operate the plants with one button you can check the skills of each plant in the Almanac15 plants to use the kinds of zombies you will meet plants will attack automatically. Come and challenge the classic Plants vs. Zombies.On PC and MobileClick or tap = select plantsDrag = move plants
item.content:encoded:
Easy to operate the plants with one button you can check the skills of each plant in the Almanac15 plants to use the kinds of zombies you will meet plants will attack automatically. Come and challenge the classic Plants vs. Zombies.
On PC and MobileClick or tap = select plantsDrag = move plants

item.title: Crowd Defense
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire
item.content:encoded:
Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.
On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire

item.title: Hospital Escaper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hospital Escaper is a unique and running casual game. This is a game of doctors and patients and contains two modes. Don’t forget to collect diamonds as you play to unlock more cool wings in the store.PCMouse click and drag to moveMobileTap and slide to move
item.content:encoded:
Hospital Escaper is a unique and running casual game. This is a game of doctors and patients and contains two modes. Don’t forget to collect diamonds as you play to unlock more cool wings in the store.
PCMouse click and drag to moveMobileTap and slide to move
